title: Gross domestic product per head
creator: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/office-for-national-statistics
summary: Gross domestic product per head at current market prices and in chained volume measures, in pounds, UK, 1998 to 2022.
description:
This dataset shows gross domestic product per head at current market prices and in chained volume measures, in pounds, UK, 1998 to 2022.

### Coverage 

UK 

#### Geography definition

Local Authority Districts and Unitary Authorities,
ITL1 (UK Nations, English Regions, UK less Extra-Regio)

### Source

 - UK: [Office for National Statistics](https://www.ons.gov.uk/economy/grossdomesticproductgdp/bulletins/regionaleconomicactivitybygrossdomesticproductuk/previousreleases) 


### Source Notes and Caveats 
- GDP per head at current market prices time series includes the effects of inflation and is most useful for comparison of levels across different areas.

- GDP per head at current market prices time series have the effects of inflation removed by considering changes in quantity between consecutive periods, holding prices from previous periods constant and is most useful for monitoring growth over time within any given area.

- 2022 data are provisional.

Gross domestic product per head at curre.label: Gross domestic product per head at current market price
Gross domestic product per head at curre.subtitle: GDP per head including the effects of inflation
Gross domestic product per head at curre.longDescription: This indicator shows gross domestic product (GDP) per head at current market prices in pounds, in the UK, for 1998 to 2022.
Gross domestic product per head at curre.caveats:
These time series includes the effects of inflation and is most useful for comparison of levels across different areas.

2022 data are provisional.

Data for the City of London has been excluded from the visualisations on this service due to its very high GDP figures, which distort the overall representation. Please refer back to the [data source](https://www.ons.gov.uk/economy/grossdomesticproductgdp/bulletins/regionaleconomicactivitybygrossdomesticproductuk/previousreleases) for this information.

Gross domestic product per head in chain.label: Gross domestic product per head in chained volume measure
Gross domestic product per head in chain.subtitle: GDP per head with the effects of inflation removed by considering changes in quantity between consecutive periods, holding prices from previous periods constant
Gross domestic product per head in chain.longDescription: This indicator shows gross domestic product (GDP) per head in chained volume measures (CVM) in 2019 money value, in pounds, in the UK, for 1998 to 2022.
Gross domestic product per head in chain.caveats:
These time series have the effects of inflation removed by considering changes in quantity between consecutive periods, holding prices from previous periods constant and is most useful for monitoring growth over time within any given area.

2022 data are provisional.

Data for the City of London has been excluded from the visualisations on this service due to its very high GDP figures, which distort the overall representation. Please refer back to the [data source](https://www.ons.gov.uk/economy/grossdomesticproductgdp/bulletins/regionaleconomicactivitybygrossdomesticproductuk/previousreleases) for this information.
